ChessBoard
A chessboard that can hold and rearrange chess pieces.
ChessGame
For a class that can manage a chess game, making moves on a board Note: You can add to this interface, but you should not alter the existing methods.
ChessGame.TeamColor
Enum identifying the 2 possible teams in a chess game
ChessMove
Represents moving a chess piece on a chessboard Note: You can add to this interface, but you should not alter the existing methods.
ChessPiece
Represents a single chess piece Note: You can add to this interface, but you should not alter the existing methods.
ChessPiece.PieceType
The various different chess piece options
ChessPosition
Represents a single square position on a chess board Note: You can add to this interface, but you should not alter the existing methods.
